synopsis: Pororo and Crong are going to fly a plane that Edy made. Pororo and Crong cheer when they see the penguin shaped plane but the others are a bit skeptical about whether it will fly or not.

Popo and Pipi, who crash landed in Pororo's village find Loopy's house empty and enter it while the others are out. While waiting, Popo and Pipi find something interesting - Loopy's paint brush. Popo observes the paint brush carefully.
One dark night when everyone is asleep, Eddy is making something. He is making his assistant robot, Robot Eddy - (Rody). But when Eddy falls asleep something goes horribly wrong!

Eddy makes a house for his assistant robot Rody. Everyone else prepares a gift for Rody. A party is thrown for Rody and everyone congratulates him, but Rody finds out that he cannot eat cake or drink milk like the others and feels sad.
Crong wants to play with Pororo's new toy plane but Pororo doesn't want to share with Crong. Will Pororo ever learn how to share with his friends?

Pororo and Crong fly far away to a strange place where Tongtong the magic dragon is living. Tongtong was trying to get food by using his magic. With many failures, Tongtong succeeds in making an apple.

title.jp: I Want To Be A Super Hero

synopsis: Pororo and Crong are playing "Super Hero". But Pororo wouldn't take turns playing Super Hero. Crong snatches Pororo's 'Hero' mask and runs off. Crong asks Rody to play. Crong is the hero and Rody is the villain with a mask.
Little dragon Tongtong is showing magic tricks to his friends today. Turning a cactus into a clock ... but Tongtong turns into a clock instead! Tongtong's magic is a bit clumsy.

Pororo and friends are fishing today. One moment, Eddy's fishing pole shows a sign. Rolling up his fishing pole, Eddy is disappointed to find a small fish on the end. Pororo makes fun of the size of the fish.
Pororo and friends are at Eddy's house looking at a new toy Eddy has made. Pororo likes the new toy and asks Eddy to borrow it for a day. But Crong also wants to play with the toy.
Friends are gathered at Loopy's house and she tells a story. Once upon a time in a beautiful palace, there lived a King named Harry and his two daughters, Petty and Loopy.

Pororo and friends are playing soccer on the beach. At first Pororo's team is winning 2:0. But Eddy's team is starting to catch up. They are all playing their best and the game becomes more and more exciting.

Pororo and friends are making a snowman and having a snow fight in the forest but the snow keeps on falling and it becomes hard, too hard to even move. Eddy and Rody come with a bulldozer to help their friends.

Loopy is baking pie for her friends. Watching Loopy back, Petty decides to bake some cookies. Finally Loopy and Petty's cake and cookies are done and they invite their friends. Loopy's pie is served first and everyone enjoys it.
Pororo and  Crong are on their way to Tongtong's house on their plane. Crong finds a magic wand in a jar. Fascinated by the wand, Crong waves it and the wand casts a spell on Crong.

Today Eddy made a weather forecasting machine. The weather forecasting machine is attached to Rody's back. It says that there will be strong winds blowing tomorrow. Everyone worries though at the forecast for that night.

Eddy says that he will fix the space ship so that Popo and Pipi can go back home. Eddy starts fixing Popo and Pipi's space ship. At last the space ship is floating, but while test driving it, one of the boosters blow up.

Eddy finally fixed Popo and Pipi's space ship. Popo and Pipi and the others are so sad to be parting. Loopy gives Popo and Pipi a basket of cookies as a parting gift. With Loopy's present, Popo and Pipi return to their home planet in their space ship.

While Pororo is taking a nap, Crong makes a wonderful castle out of building blocks. He tries to wake Pororo to show his castle, but sleepy Pororo just briefly wakes up and reads a book that Crong gave him and falls back to sleep.

Everyone is playing rock-scissors-paper in front of Pororo's house. Tongtong comes down from the sky to see them. Poby says that he is envious of Tongtong's ability to fly, so Tongtong uses his magic to make Poby fly. Kurikuri Tongtongtong!
Once upon a time there lived a little penguin wearing a red hood named Petty. Kind Petty is on her way to Uncle Poby's house with home made cookies.

Eddy asks rody to join him playing baseball. But Rody either throws the ball in the wrong direction, or so hard that Eddy gets knocked down catching it. Pororo says that he wants to play baseball with Rody.
Today everyone is going to Tongtong's house in Eddy's hot air balloon. Tongtong's wall clock and cat doll, Nyao are chasing each other when Pororo and friends arrive at Tongtong's house.
Everyone is a Petty's house today. They are listening to Petty reading a fairy tale. Tongtong is getting ready to go to Petty's house. Nyao, the kitten is insisting on following Tongtong there.
Everyone is flying kites on the hill, but the wind blows to strong and the kite string breaks. Moreover, Loopy's pretty hat is blown off the cliff. Eddy and Rody step forward to get Loopy's hat.
Harry teaches Poby how to dance and sing, but harry is not satisfied with Poby's performance. After being scolded by Harry, Poby quietly goes out of his house with a bag.
Eddy accidentally drops one of Loopy's favorite bunny doll, Toto, on the floor. Loopy gets furious.
When Poby keeps on yawning and can't seem to wake up one morning, Harry sings his favorite song to help wake Poby. But Poby can't stand the cracking voice of Harry.

Pororo and Crong come to Tongtong's house while Tongtong is out. They wait for Tongtong and fall asleep. Zzzz~zzz~ Because of Pororo and Crong's snoring, Clock and Kitten ask the magic wand to stop the noisy snore.

Crong breaks his toy car while playing with it. Pororo and Crong head to Poby's house for help, but Poby is already busy fixing Harry's house. Loopy is impressed with Poby's handy work and says that Poby is the best.
Crong likes Loopy's doll Toto. So he asks Loopy’s permission to borrow the doll for one night. Crong gets to borrow the doll and he falls asleep with it in his bed.
Pororo and Crong played at the playground with their ball. They forgot about the ball and went home. When they returned to the playground to find their ball, it was lost.
Eddy made a robot toy frog. But this frog is a hand full. Something in its part must have gone wrong. Eddy finally gets a hold of the leaping frog and turns it off.
While Pororo is out of the house, Crong scribbles on the wall with paint. Pororo gets angry when he returns home and Crong runs out to the playground.
Pororo and friends are out watching the stars at night. A shooting star land near them and Crong takes the star home. He puts the star in a box and goes to sleep.

Poby wakes up late one morning and accidentally drops a pepper shaker. With the pepper in the air, Poby's nose itches and he lets out a sneeze. Harry took Poby's sneezing the wrong way. He worries that Poby is coming down with a cold.
Pororo and friends are out in the ocean fishing. The sharks are around and they surround the boat. Pororo and friends are in trouble! Eddy suggests playing a game. The winner gets what he wants.
Today Pororo and Crong are making snowmen in front of their house. Pororo made his snowman looking just like Crong, and Crong made a snowman looking just like Pororo.

Today is Poby's birthday. Pororo and Crong are preparing Poby's presents. When Crong sees a teddy bear inside Pororo's train present, he wants to put one in his truck. Pororo heads to Poby's house alone.

Eddy and Rody were dancing and singing. Pororo and friends head to Eddy’s house and hear Eddy’s song. Eddy doesn’t like singing in front of his friends because he is embarrassed, but when everyone asks him to sing, Eddy gives a try.

Everyone is enjoying Loopy's sandwich. When there is only one piece left, Eddy brings out his cloning machine to make more sandwiches. He puts a sandwich in the machine and...ta dah~ Sandwich is cloned.

The Kitten was playing with a ball at Petty's house when he accidentally hits Petty's vase with the ball. Feeling sorry about what he did, the kitten decides to clean Petty's house while Petty is out.

Poby is reading a tale. Long ago, Pororo, Crong and Harry lived in a small cabin. The three were singing and dancing to Pororo's accordion. Pororo stepped on a piece of wood and fell, hurting his arm.
Crong arrives on top of the cloud, in front of the magic castle. Crong heads to the castle where the wicked magician Tongtong lives.

Everyone is out today for a sled race. The race was closed, and Pororo and Crong's team came in first. Eddy and Rody's team came in second and Poby and Harry's team in third. Furious at losing the race, Eddy spent the night making a new sled.

Eddy dreams of becoming famous in his dream. His friends come and wake him up and ask about what he was dreaming. Rody learns that his friends can dream and wants to dream in his sleep. But Eddy says that robots don't have dreams in their sleep.

Tongtong is making one of his magic potions today. This time he is making one to turn Clock into a brand new clock. Instead of turning into a brand new clock, it turns into a police car. Tongtong makes a new magic potion, but Clock refuses to take it.
Everyone heads to the forest to get the fruit of the Sun tree that will cure Rody from the magic potion. In the forest, Pororo and friends meet mushrooms who threaten to eat all of them.

Today is the day Pororo and friends go on a picnic, but Poby and Harry over slept. Poby rushed to their meeting place and hurt his leg on the way. Poby can’t walk so he tells his friends to go without him.
As Eddy caught a cold, everyone was worried. Tongtong gives Eddy warm tea to drink. But it turns out to be a dancing potion.

To avoid the snow one day, Pororo and friends went into a cave. The cave had furniture and food in it. Eddy and Harry had some fruit as they were hungry. All of a sudden a monster appeared and got mad at taking his food without permission.
Pororo and friends are at the playground playing hide and seek. Poby is it. He finds everyone else but Petty.
